attributes.comment:
Dear USCIS-
Please do not increase the costs on the I-600A. The international adoption
proceess is already a very expensive process. Given the long timeframes
required for those of us adopting from China, the possibility of needing to
apply twice is very real. Hence, it is doubly expensive for us to see a raise
in your fees. Please do not raise the fees until Congress authorizes an
extension of the timeline on the I-600A/I-171H. It would be fair if the rise in
price coresponded with helping us NOT need to apply again. It would save us
money and it would save you, the department, resourses as you would not need to
address the re-applications. This would benefit both of us.
Thank you for your concideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Patrick
